message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This is a fair split to start.
Let's meet in the middle, 55-45 seems fair to me.
The longer this goes on, the less appealing your offers will be, Bob. I'm being generous.
I'll take a bigger share to compensate for the inflation, still a good deal for you.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it, but the clock is ticking.
